title: ISic020598. ISic020598
body:
Facsimile Images

Δίοπος

Apparatus criticus

Text after Arena (IGASM 5)

English translation

Italian translation

commentary

Other known evidence of this name is found in Pliny (NH XXXV.152) where it is listed among the names of fictores (sculptors) who came to Italy together with Demaratus of Corinth.

bibliography

  • Arena 1998 81 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000637
  • Dubois 1989 112, pl. XVIII.46 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000187
  • Cordano 1984 32, fig. 4 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001433
  • 34.0939 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796
  • 34.0939.3 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796
  • Gras 1980-1981 109 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002457
